content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Two wooden chests storing iron plates at (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)

### Additional Storage (Position x=5.5, y=2.5-3.5)
Consists of:
- One wooden chest at (5.5, 3.5)
- One burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (2.0, 7.0) and (4.0, 7.0)
- Two burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5) and (4.5, 8.5)
- Two wooden chests storing copper plates at (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=33.5-37.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 35.5)
- Boiler at (7.0, 35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5, 35.5)
- Two pipe groups connecting components:
  - Water pipe system at (5.5, 33.5) connecting pump to boiler
  - Steam pipe system at (8.5, 35.5) connecting boiler to steam engine
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles connecting power consumers

### Research Facility
Consists of:
- Lab at (6.5, 16.5)
- Connected to the power grid via electric pole at (4.26, 20.74)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing structures at invalid locations
- Before placing structures, verify that the target location is clear and suitable
- The first attempt to place the lab at (29.0, 42.0) failed because the location was invalid
- Choose locations that are within the buildable area and not occupied by other entities

### Power system optimization
- Boiler is currently out of fuel and not operating
- Ensure fuel is loaded into the boiler to maintain power generation
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning, indicating the steam transport system needs attention

### Production line efficiency
- Multiple furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warning
- Ensure proper supply of raw materials to keep production lines operating continuously
